title: Soldier assigned to MPs security dies of self inflicted wounds
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); An Army soldier who was on duty guarding the house of TNA MP M.A. Sumanthiran has committed suicide.
Police Media Spokesperson, SSP Nihal Thalduwa stated that the soldier had opened fire at himself, at a land adjacent to the MP’s house at around 7.30 AM today (4).
The deceased has been identified as a 22 year old soldier residing in the Walapane area.
Soldier assigned to MPs security dies of self inflicted wounds
